channel.title: 317 Shop question
channel.description:
Hey guys i have the insidiax source and i am trying to figure out how to make it so there is only one in the shop but the inventory of the shop doesnt deplete when someone buys. I dont like having it say 100k i want it to have 1 but when someone buys it there is still 1.
I came from coding 562 server and its way different please help mee :)
